paragraphs.text:
%md
# About
**Lab:** Create Cloudair DB in PostgreSQL
**Objective:** Become familiar with using PSQL interpreter to create a DB 
**File locations:** hostname:~/data/cloudair
**Successful outcome:** Practice using Zeppelin and PSQL
**Before you begin:** N/A
**Related lessons:** Zeppelin

---

msg.data:
About

Lab: Create Cloudair DB in PostgreSQL
Objective: Become familiar with using PSQL interpreter to create a DB
File locations: hostname:~/data/cloudair
Successful outcome: Practice using Zeppelin and PSQL
Before you begin: N/A
Related lessons: Zeppelin

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Setup

paragraphs.title: Retrieve the files from /var/data
paragraphs.text:
%sh
rm -r /tmp/cloudair
mkdir /tmp/cloudair
cp /var/data/cloudair/* /tmp/cloudair/

paragraphs.title: List the directory /tmp/cloudair
paragraphs.text:
%sh
ls /tmp/cloudair/

paragraphs.title: Use bunzip2 to extract the files
paragraphs.text:
%sh
bunzip2 /tmp/cloudair/eu_country.csv.bz2
bunzip2 /tmp/cloudair/sale.csv.bz2
bunzip2 /tmp/cloudair/us_customer.csv.bz2
bunzip2 /tmp/cloudair/ww_customer.csv.bz2

paragraphs.title: List the contents of /tmp/cloudair
paragraphs.text:
%sh
ls /tmp/cloudair

%md
# Lab

%md
# Result
**You have now:** You have now successfully created a Cloudair database in PostgreSQL.

---

msg.data:
Result

You have now: You have now successfully created a Cloudair database in PostgreSQL.

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Solution
---

paragraphs.title: 1 - Use shell Interpreter to list cloudair tables
paragraphs.text:
%sh
export PGPASSWORD='BadPass%1'; psql -h db01.cloudair.lan -U devuser -d cloudair -p 5432  <<EOF
\dt
EOF

paragraphs.title: 2 - Use psql to drop tables
3 - Use shell Interpreter to again list cloudair tables
paragraphs.text:
%sh
export PGPASSWORD='BadPass%1'; psql -h db01.cloudair.lan -U devuser -d cloudair -p 5432  <<EOF
\dt
EOF

paragraphs.title: 4 - Create table eu_countries
5 - Load data into eu_countries
paragraphs.text:
%sh
export PGPASSWORD='BadPass%1'; psql -h db01.cloudair.lan -U devuser -p 5432 -d cloudair <<EOF
\copy eu_country FROM '/tmp/cloudair/eu_country.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV
EOF

paragraphs.title: 6 - Query table eu_countries limit 5
paragraphs.text:
%psql
SELECT * From eu_country limit 5;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
country_name	country_code	region
Austria	AT	EU
Belgium	BE	EU
Bulgaria	BG	EU
Croatia	HR	EU
Cyprus	CY	EU

paragraphs.title: 7 - Create table sale
paragraphs.text:
%psql
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS sale;

CREATE TABLE sale(
    entry_date DATE,
    item VARCHAR(64),
    sales_code INT,
    cc_type VARCHAR(24),
    first_name VARCHAR(64),
    last_name VARCHAR(64),
    city VARCHAR(64),
    country_name VARCHAR(64),
    purchase_date DATE,
    delivery_date DATE,
    purchase_price NUMERIC (10,2),
    credits NUMERIC (10,2)
);

paragraphs.title: 8 - Load data into sales
paragraphs.text:
%sh
export PGPASSWORD='BadPass%1'; psql -h db01.cloudair.lan -U devuser -p 5432 -d cloudair <<EOF
\copy sale FROM '/tmp/cloudair/sale.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV
EOF

paragraphs.title: 9 - Query table sales limit 5
paragraphs.text:
%psql
SELECT * FROM sale LIMIT 5;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 10 - Create table us_customer
paragraphs.text:
%psql
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS us_customer;

CREATE TABLE us_customer(
    row_number INT,
    title VARCHAR(8),
    first_name VARCHAR(64),
    middle_initial VARCHAR(4),
    last_name VARCHAR(64),
    name_set VARCHAR(24),
    street_address VARCHAR(128),
    city VARCHAR(64),
    state VARCHAR(8),
    state_name VARCHAR(64),
    zip_code VARCHAR(12),
    country_code VARCHAR(8),
    country_name VARCHAR(64),
    telephone_country_code VARCHAR(4),
    telephone_number VARCHAR(24),
    email_address VARCHAR(64),
    user_name VARCHAR(24),
    password VARCHAR(24),
    national_id VARCHAR(12),
    mrn VARCHAR (64),
    insurance_id INT,
    cc_type VARCHAR(24),
    cc_number VARCHAR(24),
    cvv2 INT,
    cc_expires DATE,
    occupation VARCHAR(128),
    company VARCHAR(64),
    domain VARCHAR(64),
    vehicle VARCHAR(64),
    gender VARCHAR(12),
    mother_maiden VARCHAR(64),
    birthday DATE,
    tropical_zodiac VARCHAR(24),
    age INT,
    eye_color VARCHAR(12),
    blood_type VARCHAR(4),
    weight NUMERIC (6, 2),
    height NUMERIC (6, 2),
    latitude NUMERIC (12, 8),
    longitude NUMERIC (12, 8)
    );

paragraphs.title: 11 - Load data into us_customers
paragraphs.text:
%sh
export PGPASSWORD='BadPass%1'; psql -h db01.cloudair.lan -U devuser -p 5432 -d cloudair <<EOF
\copy us_customer FROM '/tmp/cloudair/us_customer.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER
EOF

paragraphs.title: 12 - Query table us_customers limit 5
paragraphs.text:
%psql
SELECT * FROM us_customer LIMIT 5;

paragraphs.title: 13 - Create table ww_customer
paragraphs.text:
%psql
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ww_customer;

CREATE TABLE ww_customer(
    row_number INT,
    title VARCHAR(8),
    first_name VARCHAR(64),
    middle_initial VARCHAR(4),
    last_name VARCHAR(64),
    name_set VARCHAR(24),
    street_address VARCHAR(128),
    city VARCHAR(64),
    state_code VARCHAR(8),
    state_name VARCHAR(64),
    zip_code VARCHAR(12),
    country_code VARCHAR(8),
    country_name VARCHAR(64),
    telephone_country_code VARCHAR(4),
    telephone_number VARCHAR(24),
    email_address VARCHAR(64),
    username VARCHAR(24),
    password VARCHAR(24),
    national_id VARCHAR(24),
    mrn VARCHAR (64),
    insurance_id INT,
    cc_type VARCHAR(24),
    cc_number VARCHAR(24),
    cvv2 INT,
    cc_expires VARCHAR(12),
    occupation VARCHAR(128),
    company VARCHAR(64),
    domain VARCHAR(64),
    vehicle VARCHAR(64),
    gender VARCHAR(12),
    mothers_maiden VARCHAR(64),
    birthday VARCHAR(12),
    tropical_zodiac VARCHAR(24),
    age INT,
    eye_color VARCHAR(12),
    blood_type VARCHAR(4),
    weight NUMERIC (6, 2),
    height NUMERIC (6, 2),
    latitude NUMERIC (12, 8),
    longitude NUMERIC (12, 8)
    );

paragraphs.title: 14 - Load data into ww_customers
paragraphs.text:
%sh
export PGPASSWORD='BadPass%1'; psql -h db01.cloudair.lan -U devuser -p 5432 -d cloudair <<EOF
\copy ww_customer FROM '/tmp/cloudair/ww_customer.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER
EOF

paragraphs.title: 15 - Query ww_customers
paragraphs.text:
%psql
select * from ww_customer limit 5;

paragraphs.title: 16 - Delete the  directory for the staging data
paragraphs.text:
%sh
rm -r  /tmp/cloudair
%angular
